metadata.title: CVE-2019-12482 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereferencein the function gf_isom_get_original_format_type at isomedia/drm_sample.cin libgpac.a, as demonstrated by MP4Box.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
